commit.title: [engine] Improve backtraces of tactics.
commit.message:
[engine] Improve backtraces of tactics.

We embed proper backtrace information in the error part of the
monad. Even if a bit artisanal, the results seem to improve. For
example, for the following script:

```coq
Lemma u n : n + 0 = n.
case u.
```

we get in `master`:
```
Error: The reference u was not found in the current
environment.
Raised at file "library/nametab.ml", line 22, characters 2-63
Called from file "interp/constrintern.ml", line 1790, characters 3-92
Called from file "interp/constrintern.ml", line 2213, characters 4-16
Called from file "plugins/ltac/tacinterp.ml", line 517, characters 25-84
Called from file "plugins/ltac/tacinterp.ml", line 524, characters 4-75
Called from file "plugins/ltac/tacinterp.ml", line 867, characters 17-51
Called from file "plugins/ltac/tacinterp.ml", line 1601, characters 24-73
Called from file "engine/proofview.ml", line 1145, characters 40-46
Called from file "engine/proofview.ml", line 1150, characters 10-34
Re-raised at file "engine/proofview.ml", line 239, characters 4-38
Called from file "proofs/proof.ml", line 394, characters 4-30
Called from file "proofs/pfedit.ml", line 129, characters 28-67
Called from file "g_ltac.mlg", line 391, characters 6-82
Called from file "proofs/proof_global.ml", line 170, characters 24-36
Called from file "g_ltac.mlg", line 386, characters 15-536
Called from file "g_ltac.mlg", line 447, characters 4-26
Called from file "vernac/vernacinterp.ml", line 87, characters 4-18
```

vs in 8.8:
```
frame @ file "toplevel/vernac.ml", line 172, characters 2-66
raise @ file "clib/exninfo.ml", line 65, characters 2-15
frame @ file "str.ml", line 259, characters 6-29
raise @ file "map.ml", line 135, characters 10-25
frame @ file "stm/stm.ml", line 2635, characters 4-55
frame @ file "stm/stm.ml", line 2525, characters 4-100
raise @ file "clib/exninfo.ml", line 65, characters 2-15
frame @ file "stm/stm.ml", line 934, characters 6-10
frame @ file "stm/stm.ml", line 2384, characters 12-251
raise @ file "clib/exninfo.ml", line 65, characters 2-15
frame @ file "stm/stm.ml", line 2322, characters 10-14
frame @ file "stm/stm.ml", line 2388, characters 20-47
raise @ file "clib/exninfo.ml", line 65, characters 2-15
frame @ file "stm/stm.ml", line 1087, characters 12-91
raise @ file "clib/exninfo.ml", line 65, characters 2-15
frame @ file "vernac/vernacentries.ml", line 2344, characters 4-36
```

which clearly makes no sense.

commit.title: [engine] Improve backtraces of tactics.
commit.message:
[engine] Improve backtraces of tactics.

We embed proper backtrace information in the error part of the
monad. Even if a bit artisanal, the results seem to improve. For
example, for the following script:

```coq
Lemma u n : n + 0 = n.
case u.
```

we get in `master`:
```
